cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and potential system instability during initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid enum 'invalid_hw' will cause logging configuration errors and potential hardware-related issues during operation.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid_hw'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並在操作期間造成潛在的硬體相關問題。
